_text_:
In Segment rows, you can move (translate), rotate, or scale child widgets. For example, you can display a rotating logo or a hand icon that simulates waving by moving back and forth.
Also, your app can slide interface controls into a row from off screen. Or it can simulate the hands of an analog clock moving onscreen.
Apart from the above, you can also animated the row height using the row animation capabilities.

This app animates the row height for the list present in the bottom of the landing screen. This list contains a list of already added payees. Once you tap on one of the rows, the row expands to show additional details for that payee.
